title: Acceleration of electron in B field

content.question: An electron with speed <math alttext="3 times 10 to the power 3, meters per second" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>3</mn><mo>×</mo><msup><mrow><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></msup><mtext> </mtext><mrow><mtext> </mtext><mtext> m</mtext><mo>/</mo><mtext>s</mtext></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math> is moving in a circle perpendicular to a <math alttext="0.001 Tesla" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>0.001</mn><mtext> </mtext><mtext> T</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math> uniform magnetic field. What is the acceleration of the electron?

choices.label: <math alttext="1.9 times 10 to the power negative 12, meters per second squared" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>1.9</mn><mo>×</mo><msup><mrow><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow><mo>−</mo><mn>12</mn></mrow></msup><mtext> </mtext><mtext> </mtext><mrow><mtext>m</mtext><mo>/</mo><mrow><msup><mrow><mtext>s</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup></mrow></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="1.7 times 10 to the power negative 5, meters per second squared" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>1.7</mn><mo>×</mo><msup><mrow><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow><mo>−</mo><mn>5</mn></mrow></msup><mtext> </mtext><mrow><mtext> </mtext><mtext> m</mtext><mo>/</mo><mrow><msup><mrow><mtext>s</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup></mrow></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="1.8 times 10 to the power 8, meters per second squared" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>1.8</mn><mo>×</mo><msup><mrow><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>8</mn></mrow></msup><mtext> </mtext><mtext> </mtext><mrow><mtext>m</mtext><mo>/</mo><mrow><msup><mrow><mtext>s</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup></mrow></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="5.3 times 10 to the power 11, meters per second squared" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>5.3</mn><mo>×</mo><msup><mrow><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>11</mn></mrow></msup><mtext> </mtext><mrow><mtext> </mtext><mtext> m</mtext><mo>/</mo><mrow><msup><mrow><mtext>s</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup></mrow></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="5.3 times 10 to the power 11, meters per second squared" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>5.3</mn><mo>×</mo><msup><mrow><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>11</mn></mrow></msup><mtext> </mtext><mrow><mtext> </mtext><mtext> m</mtext><mo>/</mo><mrow><msup><mrow><mtext>s</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup></mrow></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math>

skill.text: 2.B: Calculate or estimate an unknown quantity with units from known quantities, by selecting and following a logical computational pathway.
